text: Vox is an American news and opinion website. The website was started in April 2014 by Ezra Klein, Matt Yglesias, and Melissa Bell, and is known for using explanatory journalism. Vox also includes a YouTube channel, some podcasts, and a show presented on Netflix. Many sources say that Vox is left-leaning and progressive. == References == Category:American news websites
title: Vox (website)
